title: Looking for a ranked team
body: i'm currently plat 3, climbing my way up to diamond, i'm a support main (would be the role i'd play in the team) but i can also play mid and top as well,  Wheats13 feel free to add me

replies.body: Hello :) are you interested in joining hitrost? because if you are hmu at "Kiter" in game

Been stuck in g4 g3 for about 2 weeks now 
Cant get these promos for some reason
main top and would be good playing with higher elo Z
Not much for u but XD
Very solid player, have played with him before. Can recommend +
